💸 10X YOUR LIFE IN 10 EASY STEPS 💥

  • 🚀 Wake up at 4:44 AM — the universe notices hustle.
  • 💰 Invest 100% of your net worth in altcoins you can't pronounce.
  • 🧊 Cold shower. No exceptions. Ever.
  • 🎥 Start a podcast. Doesn’t matter the topic. Just do it.
  • 🧘 Microdose wisdom: meditate while trading NFTs.
  • 📈 Say “bullish” 3x before breakfast.
  • 🦍 Buy the dip. Then dip again. Then double dip.
  • 🔥 Get banned from Twitter at least once a quarter.
  • ☕ Replace coffee with pre-workout. Speak only in alpha.
  • 🧑‍🚀 Visualize the moon. Then go there.
